013package org.apache.juneau.encoders;
014
015import java.io.*;
016
017/**
018 * Encoder for handling <js>"identity"</js> encoding and decoding.
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * Identity encoding is just another name for no encoding at all.
022 *
023 * <ul class='notes'>
024 *    <li class='note'>This class is thread safe and reusable.
025 * </ul>
026 *
027 * <ul class='seealso'>
028 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.Encoders">Encoders</a>
029
030 * </ul>
031 */
032public class IdentityEncoder extends Encoder {
033
034   /** Singleton */
035   public static final IdentityEncoder INSTANCE = new IdentityEncoder();
036
037   /** Constructor. */
038   public IdentityEncoder() {}
039
040   @Override /* Encoder */
041   public InputStream getInputStream(InputStream is) throws IOException {
042      return is;
043   }
044
045   @Override /* Encoder */
046   public OutputStream getOutputStream(OutputStream os) throws IOException {
047      return os;
048   }
049
050   /**
051    * Returns <code>[<js>"identity"</js>]</code>.
052    */
053   @Override /* Encoder */
054   public String[] getCodings() {
055      return new String[]{"identity"};
056   }
057}
